headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On the Podium: The Truffade Nero Custom
content:
Celebrate your latest victory by stopping by the lobby of The Diamond Casino & Resort and give the Lucky Wheel a spin to walk away with GTA$, RP, Clothing and all sorts of mystery prizes. This week’s top reward on the podium is the Truffade Nero Custom, a tweaked-out hypercar geared specifically toward the high-end tune-up crowd.

Give it a test drive before swinging by Benny’s to see what this baby can really do.
